com.impinj.octane

Class AntennaConfigGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impinj.octane.AntennaConfigGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<AntennaConfig>

    public class AntennaConfigGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<AntennaConfig>
    This class hold the collection of antenna configuration.
    See Also:
    Settings.getAntennas()

      • getAntenna

        public AntennaConfig getAntenna(short portNumber)
                         throws OctaneSdkException
        Returns the antenna configuration for the specified antenna port.
        Parameters:
        portNumber - -- the antenna port desired
        Returns:
        the antenna configuration for the specified port
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the port does not exist.

      • enableById

        public void enableById(short[] ids)
                throws OctaneSdkException
        Enable antennas by providing a list of antenna IDs. This method does not change the status of antennas outside the provided list.
        Parameters:
        ids - the list of antennas to enable
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the port does not exist

      • disableById

        public void disableById(short[] ids)
                 throws OctaneSdkException
        Disable antennas by providing a list of antenna IDs. This method does not change the status of antennas outside the provided list.
        Parameters:
        ids - the list of antennas to disable
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the antenna port does not exist

      • enableBySector

        public void enableBySector(short[] sectors)
                    throws OctaneSdkException
        Enable antennas by providing a list of xArray sector numbers.
        Parameters:
        sectors - A list of xArray sectors to enable
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the antenna port does not exist
